metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1639 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: syncevo/installcheck-local.sh in syncevolution before 1.3.99.7 uses mktempto create a safe temporary file but appends a suffix to the originalfilename and writes to this new filename, which allows local users tooverwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the new filename.

criterions.comment: syncevolution: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
